page.title: 11Transport in Shoreham
page.content: local people think the buses are in a bad state. This is because of ripped seats and dirty floors. The survey also showed that 56% of the interviewed people that bus routes should be extended and more bus stops put in the suburban areas. The other 44% think the bus route is either good or too long. The majority of the residents thought that the fares were too expensive with only 6% thinking they were good value for money. We analysed the people who said the fares weren't good value for money and found that teenagers between 14/15 years of age thought that full fare on the buses should be at 16 instead of 14. This group also included old age pensioners who thought that they were too high because they live on a state pension and in many cases can't walk very far.
